snippet.title: CLOUD ESCAPE 2.0 - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Cloud Escape is a fast-paced 3D precision platformer with countless traps, obstacles and movement mechanics. Whether you're dashing through the large, themed areas in Classic Mode or trying to climb to the top in new game mode: The Tower.

Each game mode is a different world with unique challenges, traps, secrets and collectibles. In the new tower, you'll also encounter real enemies for the first time!

Get CLOUD ESCAPE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731120/Cloud_Escape/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/anbagames
Discord: https://discord.gg/G8SMR6T2Gb

About:
Welcome to my channel. In real life I'm a software developer and in my free time I create video games. This channel shows my progress in the shape of devlogs and other gamedev related videos. Have fun here!

#anbagames #andreasbaum #gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #indiedev #unity #unity3d #madewithunity #devlog #blender #cloudescape
